mapper.select:

distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from upms_log
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.insert: insert into upms_log (log_id, description, username, start_time, spend_time, base_path, uri, url, method, user_agent, ip, permissions, parameter, result) values (#{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{spendTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{basePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parameter,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
